jobDescription:
Why join us:

  • Flexi working hours.
  • Medical and Optical Claims.
  • Internet and mobile postpaid claims.
  • Energetic and creative office culture.
  • Career advancement opportunities

Job Responsibilities:

  • Experience in using any PHP MVC framework
  • Experience in API development and integration with third-party APIs
  • Develop business and enterprise web application
  • Analyze, design, program, test, document, and maintain IT systems or applications
  • Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

 Job Requirements:

  •  At least Bachelor Degree or professional qualification in Computer Science or a related discipline.
  • Minimum of 2 years experience in software development as full stack developer.
  • Front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery
  • Server-side languages such as PHP (Yii / Lavarel) or related frameworks
  • Database technology such as MySQL
  • Proactive, motivated and team player. Able to work both independently as well as with a team, and keen to learn about new technologies and new scope
  • Take pride in accountability, ownership of outstanding issues, and establishes a high level of credibility with others in the organization

About The Job: 工作详情：

We are looking for experienced talents that specializes in PHP coding standards,and databases. Multiple positions are available including Front-end, Back-end, or Full-stack developing. You will be working on high load applications and multi-server.

我们需要拥有资深PHP编码标准与数据经验的专业人士协助处理Front-end, Back-end或Full-stack的高负载应用程序和多服务器上的开发。

Technologies we use: 我们所使用的科技：

We work with proven technologies & stacks that allow us to bring value to our customers and satisfy their needs. You may expect to work with using some of these mentioned technologies: 我们使用经过验证的技术栈，以便我们能为客户带来相对利益并满足他们的需求。关于您将碰到的科技，可参考以下列表：

  • Web & Back-end: PHP, Laravel, OOP, VueJs

网络与Backend系统：PHP, Laravel, OOP, VueJs

  • Database: MySQL

数据库：MySQL

  • Good understanding of Cloud environment, unit testing and validation is a bonus

加分项：非常明白Cloud Environment, Unit Testing 以及 Validation

  • Software Application: Atlassian Jira, Confluence & Bitbucket

软件应用： Atlassian Jira, Confluence 与 Bitbucket

  • During WFH, we use "Gather.Town" as our web conference software to improve our work performance while maintaining interactions between the team

居家办公时，因此我们经常使用 “Gather Town”作为团队之间的开会软件和维持良好联系的工具。

In This Position, You Would Be Involved In: 在这职位中您将会：

* Developing Back-End Web using Laravel; Fixing Front End Web using VueJs, HTML, CSS and JavaScript; Fixing Back-End Web using PHP

-Backend: 以Laravel开发, 用PHP进行修复 -Frontend Web: 用VueJs, HTML, CSS 和JavaScript进行修复

* Do several researches and develop new web technologies 进行与了解多项研究和开发新的网络技术

* Setup web application according to customer requirement 根据客户需求来设定网络应用程序

* Performing variety of tasks, which includes debugging and system analysis 在所定下的时限内执行各种任务：包括调试与分析系统

* Providing technical support during software implementation 在系统实施过程中及时提供技术支援

What Will You Need: 所需资历：

* Must posses at least a Professional Certificate, Diploma, Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent 需要至少大专学历（有关：计算机科学/资讯类程序员文凭）

* At least 2 Years of working experience in the related field + Had been using Laravel in work projects for at least 2years 至少2年相关工作经验 + 在工作项目中使用 Laravel 至少2年经验

* Required skill(s)： PHP, Laravel, OOP, MYSQL

所需技能: PHP, Laravel, OOP, MYSQL

* Familiar with Laravel & MVC Web Application Architecture is a major plus 熟悉Laravel 和 MVC Web Application Architecture 是个加分项

* Possess strong skills in application design, implementation, testing and trouble-shooting

非常懂得应用程序上的设计,实施,测试与检修故障的技能

*Possess strong skills in programming and system analysis is an advantage具有较强的编程和系统分析能力者将被优先考量

* Candidates must be fluent in Mandarin language as role requires candidate to deal with mandarin speaking clients

由于需要应对中文客户，因此应聘者必须拥有很好的中文会话和理解能力

* Able to deliver job results under pressure and tight deadlines (Pressure creates motivation!)

能够在承受压力的情况下在所设定的时限内完成工作任务 （有压力才有动力！）

* Must have a strong passion for programming and research new technologies 时刻对编程与新技术上的研究充满热情

Company Culture: 公司文化：

Communications are very important, no company politics. We are a team and each other’s support, not each other’s opponent.沟通摆第一,杜绝办公室政治。我们是个团队, 是彼此的队友,不是彼此的对手。

Personality Requirements: 个性要求：

* Excellent Interpersonal and communication skills 拥有优秀的沟通技巧和能力

* Self-motivated, able to handle pressure and willing to go extra miles 自动自发，能够扛压，有强烈上进心

* Have high self disciplinary and independent thinking 拥有高度自律能力, 能够独立思考

* Sincere and responsible in work 对工作有强烈责任感

* Open-minded to new solutions, forward-thinking, and strong adaptability 对于新事物/解决方案持以开明态度，并且拥有前瞻性和强烈的适应能力

* Able to provide useful solutions/suggestions during brain-storming 于开会时勇于发表自己的有用意见

* Work hard, play hard! 努力工作使劲玩！

Shoutout: 呼吁：

If you are currently working as a software developer, you are highly encouraged to apply for this position. Welcome Aboard! 若您目前是一名在职软件开发人员，我们非常欢迎您把履历表申请提交上来~

• Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
  • Required skill(s): JAVA, frontend development, backend development, MYSQL.
  • Required language(s): Bahasa Malaysia, English
  • At least 3 years (s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Junior Executives specializing in IT/Computer - Software or equivalent.

Who we are?

At dJava Factory we don’t work, we enjoy Java, it’s our passion and we are driven by it. Our team of consultants has been handpicked over time from around the globe. Our HQ is in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; with subsidiaries in Indonesia and Vietnam. We are always looking to deliver the best solutions to our clients at every level as much as we care for the wellbeing of our staff, we care about three things: skills, work ethic, and culture. Currently we are nearly over 60 people delivering solutions at a fast paced environment and constant growing.

Your Role:

As a Fullstack Java Developer, you will work hand in hand with our clients, translating necessities into solutions. You will work in collaboration with a team of consultants and/or client personnel. You are able to deliver within deadlines. Foresee roadblocks and possible outcome. You will work in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; but projects overseas are constantly in demand, you make have the chance to take part in some of our projects abroad, (Indonesia, Vietnam, Emirates, Sweden, UK).

Who You Are?

A self-driven, tech oriented and highly motivated Java expert. You have more than knowledge to offer; you have the passion of a true developer. You go further by day, pushing yourself to deliver only the best. You have at least 3 years working experience in Java Development.

Essential Skills

  • Backend - JAVA 
  • Frontend - REACT or All ANGULAR
  • Java web application development using Spring, Struts2, Spring MVC or JSF frameworks.
  • SQL, JDBC and RDBMS, particularly Oracle and/or MYSQL
  • Object-Relational Mapping, particularly Hibernate.
  • XML and Web Services (WSDL, XSD, SOAP and HTTP)
  • Application Servers are: Tomcat, Jetty, JBoss
  • Experience with reporting platforms, especially Jasper Reports
  • Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum.
  • Subversion, GIT
  • Clean code and follow standard java software conventions

Nice to have skills

  • System engineering – Deploying and setting up environments
  • Microservices
  • jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap
  • DB2, MSSQL
  • RESTful
  • Weblogic, WebSphere, Glassfish
  • Unit testing - TestNG, JUnit
  • Performance Debugging and Testing – JMeter

Perks & Benefits

  • Allowance (travel stipends, transportation, etc.)
  • Performance Incentives
  • Central location
  • Casual dress code
  • Free snacks / Happy hours
  • Birthday Gift 
  • Regular team activities
  • Medical insurance
  • Open Culture
  • The flexibility of working from home
  • Personal development opportunities

Software Engineer (Full-Stack, PHP)

Overview:

  • You'll need to be a full-stack software engineer - Interpret project specs, design, develop, deploy and maintain business applications.
  • Handle both front & back-end development.
  • Our clients are diverse across various industries, thus giving you a unique challenge and exposure into different types of projects. 
  • Grow with us with on-the-job and structured training to enhance your skills. 

Requirements:

  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
  • You are required to have a 2nd Upper degree or above.
  • You will be given the opportunity to join a young and exciting team of developers.
  • Individuals with work experience of at least 1 year in PHP and looking for a career advancement will be given the chance to grow with the company and pick up additional skills via organised training programmes.
  • High achieving fresh graduates keen on a job challege are welcome to apply.
  • Required Skill(s): PHP, JavaScript, MYSQL, CSS, Modern UI Frameworks.
  • Alternatively, candidates must be ready to learn these skills on the job if no experience with such programming languages. 

Job Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop and maintain business software.
  • Interpret project specifications. 
  • Primarily web-based applications written in PHP.

Our client is a well-renowned tech solution provider, with several government bodies and other corporate MNC clients under its belt. They are currently looking for a Senior Backend Developer to aid in their journey to enrich lives through smart technology.

Job Highlights:

  • Holistic Career Progression Pathways
  • Friendly & Casual Office Culture

Job Responsibilities:

  • NodeJS, .NET Core as main programming languages
  • Databases such as but not limited to (PostgreSQL, MSSQL, MySQL for RDBMS, MongoDB for NoSQL)
  • Docker, Kubernetes for orchestration tools 
  • Version Control with Git
  • Using the best practice and automation tools to develop and deploy highly scalable backend solutions for both cloud and on-premise infrastructure
  • Analyze, Design, Deploy, and take ownership of the features of high quality maintainable and scalable software based on business needs

Job Requirements:

  • Familiar with writing units & integration tests, monitoring code coverages etc.
  • DevOps mindset for monitoring and deploying code with versioning tools and CI/CD
  • Familiar with container-based applications and orchestration tools (Docker and Kubernetes) for coding and debugging

How to Apply:

Please apply along with your personal portfolio which ideally showcases some of the past projects that you have contributed to, and with your latest resume attached as well.

Aaron Tan: R22104642

jobTitle: Software Engineer (Full Stack Developer | Remote Work)
jobDescription:
· Pasir Panjang (Office) | WFH Basis

· 5 days work

· Attractive Salary Package

· Company Benefits & Incentives

· Company Industry - Software Company

Interested applicants can also send your resume to (ivy_leo thesupremehr.com) or contact +65 94283063 and allow our Consultant to match you with our Clients. No Charges will be incurred by Candidates for any service rendered.

Backend Developer:

Frontend Developer - Bootstrap, React JS，API

Responsibility

Required Skill(s)

  • minimum 3 Years Of experience with

  • Familiar to Agile software development environment.

Benefits:

Job Highlights

Job Descriptions :

jobTitle: Full Stack Developer (ReactJS / C# / NodeJS / Python) - internship & full time
jobDescription:
We are looking for motivated and responsible Senior or Mid-level software developers (ReactJS / C# / NodeJS / Python) that’s passionate in FinTech and about the latest technology in a team. You will have the opportunity to make significant contributions to the company.

You will join a team of highly talented Software Developers, and full-time opportunity to involve / handle the development of FinTech projects.

Job Description

  • Building, maintain and scaling user-focused web applications and mobile applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Collaborate with fronted and backend developers in order to develop an interactive and scalable web, mobile and desktop application.
  • Develop, test and deliver unique creative pieces using the latest technologies.
  • Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges.
  • Primary focus will be development of all client-side, integration of server-side APIs, ensuring high performance web application and ultimately ensuring great user experience if you are interested in creating and implementing visual and interactive elements in a web application.
  • Multi-task and thrive in a fast-paced, results driven organization.

Job Requirements

  • Attitude is everything. As long as you are willing to learn, take up challenges and responsibilities, the stage is for you to shine.
  • At least 1 years of experience in ReactJS / C# / NodeJS / Python programming.
  • Willing and excited to learn and explore new technologies.
  • Good knowledge of programming low-level, high-performance, clean and high-quality code
  • Experience in Fintech is a plus.
  • Self-motivated nature and the ability to work autonomously with minimal supervision.
  • Primary Language: Mandarin (As require to liaise with Mandarin/Cantonese Speaking Clients due to work nature)

Internship

OverWatch is looking for passionate candidates to join our IT trainee program, 4-6 month incubator program gives you a holistic learning experience and builds your career experience in fintech industry. If you’re exceptional at embracing our company values, you’ll get an immediate job offer from OverWatch at the end of the program.

Who are encouraged to apply

  • Highly passionate on coding, software development.
  • Highly responsible, self-disciplined, self-managed, and self-motivated.
  • Creative, willing to push boundaries and challenge conventional thinking. Dare to make mistakes and learn from it.
  • Passionate on Financial Technologies, has a strong willingness to learn it quickly.

jobTitle: Senior Software Engineer - Career and Connect (Hybrid Working)
jobDescription:
The Role

The Senior Software Engineer is responsible for the development, implementation, maintenance, and support of software solutions. This job requires an active hands-on contributor in the software development life cycle, performing analysis and design as well as a proven team player to achieve project goals.

 Key responsibilities include:

  • Help evolve delivery processes to continuously improve the Seek Asia apps.
  • Contributing to SEEK’s overall apps technology strategy and aligning systems with that strategy.
  • Ensuring systems are fit for purpose, well architected and follow current SEEK development practices.
  • Maintaining platform health ensuring that our systems are highly scalable, available, performant, maintainable, secure and cost effective.
  • Driving customer focus to ensure that we are delivering great outcomes for our customers.
  • Help facilitate the healthy tension between the desire for immediate delivery and the long-term viability of the code bases.
  • Share operational support duties.

So, what we are looking for?

We are looking for a full stack senior engineer to help us building some of our green field projects, someone with a start-up background and growth mindset would fit perfectly in our team. 

Experience

  • Involve in collaboration with stakeholders to understand business challenges and customer needs, removing bottlenecks and identifying new opportunities for growth. 
  • Knowledge of industry best practices, regulations and compliance (GDPR, PDPI), and quality assurance techniques. 
  • Experience working with geo-distributed teams. 

Personal Skills

  • Applies relevant technologies knowledge to the development and improvement of software applications, being able to drive better technical decision at the team level.
  • Positive attitude and a clear sense of initiative.
  • Has a growth mindset - flexible, open, and actively seeking opportunities to improve.
  • Continuously learn and understand the business requirements, customer, and end-user feedback to further improve the products.
  • Actively investing time in technical growth.
  • Manage own time well, being able to support fellow engineers and be critical on inefficiencies. 
  • Highly self-motivated team player with good analytical and conceptual thinking, results-driven and customer focus.
  • Ability to share new knowledge and new tools to cultivate constructive conversations and improve team capabilities.
  • Open minded collaborator and clear communicator who can manage stakeholders' expectations well.

Technical Skills

  • Test-driven development and agile software delivery methods.
  • Hands-on experience in estimating, planning, designing, implementing, testing and operating highly scalable, available, performant, maintainable, secure and cost effective, being able to implement this independently and able to support other team members with supervision and direction to achieve our team goals.
  • Knowledge in JavaScript, Typescript, React and ideally React Native.
  • Creates software in at least two modern software development languages.
  • Creates and maintains continuous delivery pipelines using current agile practices, patterns & tooling.
  • Creates software using secure coding practices and mitigates common vulnerabilities.
  • Working knowledge of modern stacks e.g. Node.js, Express, GraphQL, Jest, React, Docker, Apollo.
  • Uses current technical practices such as writing clean, testable code and pair programming.
  • Knowledge of building solutions deployed on AWS with immutable infrastructure via infrastructure as code.

The Team

Our team is responsible for building the next “big thing” for our customers, armed with a startup mindset, trying to experiment in new areas to deliver added values to SEEK customers through green fields projects.

We operate under the 3 brands of JobStreet, JobsDB and SEEK to help over 150 million candidates find employment.

Additional Information

﻿At SEEK, the health and safety of our people is our highest priority. For this reason, SEEK has a policy requiring all new employees to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19, unless a formal medical exemption applies. On this basis, as part of the application process you will be asked to confirm that you have read and understood this policy, and would like to continue with the hiring process. Further details about this policy will be shared during the hiring process, as required.

We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer. Proficient in programming languages such as Javascript (JAMStack Framework) or C# (.NET Framework), have good knowledge of Windows server, SQL or NoSQL Database, and have DevOps experience. You value your work, and you want to make a significant contribution to an established and collaborative team of developers.

About the Role

Reporting to the Development Manager, you will be responsible for maintaining and improving our existing software product line. You will be required to maintain a high standard of quality in the code, including functional and non-functional testing. Following accepted best practices, processes, and tools, you will engage with the team for continuous improvement in an agile environment.

Technical Skills Required:

  • At least 2 years working experience with Javascript (JAMStack Framework – React / Vue) or C# (.NET Framework)
  • Experience in developing API and Microservices
  • Knowledge of Agile/SCRUM/Kanban
  • Git (for source code management)
  • DevOps – CI/CD
  • Cloud experience using AWS and Azure services

Soft Skills:

  • Strong interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills.
  • Strong client interaction skills at multiple levels

Bonus Skills:

·       Microsoft Servers and Server Applications

·       PHP

·       Test automation (Cypress.io, Selenium)

·       MySQL, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server

As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for:

  • Produce scalable software solutions with clean, functional code on the back end and front end.
  • Design, develop, test, implement, maintenance of web applications to be utilized by business customers with the process of software development life cycle (SDLC).
  • Database design and implement scalable web service APIs.
  • Ensure quality of development by writing unit tests, system testing (SIT), code review, knowledge sharing, etc.
  • Overseeing and guiding the analyzing, writing, building, and deployment of software.
  • Work with UX designers.
  • Report progress updates to the respective Team Lead / Manager.
  • Researching & adopting new technologies for Company & team efficiently.

The person we are looking for:

Background:

  • Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent

Experience:

  • Preferably with at least 5 years of related working experience in R&D or backend development role using PHP/Python, MySQL, and MongoDB.
  • Preferably with at least 5 years of related working experience in frontend development using React JS.
  • Experience in system analysis, database analysis, and software development methodologies especially in Agile software development.

Knowledge & Skills:

  • Required: HTML5, React Js, PHP (Laravel / Lumen Framework), AJAX, CSS3, XML, JSON, MariaDB database, MySQL, MongoDB, and GIT repositories.
  • Knowledge of Nginx/Apache web servers and hybrid development frameworks e.g. React Native will be a strong advantage.
  • Familiar with the Linux environment (server), and working with docker’s container based on application development.
  • Handle application security features including authentication, data encryption, API security, etc.
  • Excellent debugging and problem-resolving skills.

Personal Attributes:

  • Self-motivated & able to work independently with minimum supervision.
  • Able to work well under pressure to meet tight deadlines and handle multiple tasks.
  • Innovative mindset & eagerness to learn new technologies.
  • Meticulous personality.

You will play an important role in

  • Gather functional requirements and specifications to gain a complete sense of client expectations and limitations before the start of a major technical development project.
  • Develop technical architecture solutions for web applications, mobile applications, reporting, enterprise integrations, data store and processing layers that cater for scalability, high availability, security and high performance design.
  • Create and confidently deliver technical documentations internally and externally for various aspects throughout development life cycle.
  • Develop feasible and justifiable development activity plan, effort estimation and technical costing to support the business objective.
  • Lead project developments and overcome any technical obstacle to ensure projects are always delivered on time within budget and satisfactory quality.
  • Constantly research on technologies and be able to apply new technologies rationally in the technical architecture and application framework development.

Key opportunities:

  • To strengthen your team leadership skills by leading and coaching technical developers including performing technical project reviews.
  • To strengthen your non-technical leadership skills by joining our Leadership Team in supporting pre-sales activities.

To be successful in this role, you will need to have

  • At least Bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
  • Minimum 5 solid year(s) of technical experience and background in developing technical architecture, and actual system implementations.
  • MUST have skills (Fullstack technologies):
  1. PHP
  2. SQL Server
  3. Bootstrap
  4. Javascript
  5. Xamarin and / or
  6. Flutter
  • Strong knowledge and have at least 2 years experiences in actual implementation experience on cloud platform (Azure, AWS or Ali Cloud)
  • Malaysian only

jobTitle: Software Engineer - Mobile - Career and Connect (Hybrid Working)
jobDescription:

jobTitle: Lead Engineer - Mobile - Career and Connect (Hybrid Working)
jobDescription:
The Role

The Lead Engineer role is responsible for leading a team towards development, implementation, maintenance, and support of software solutions. This job requires an active hands-on contributor in the software development life cycle, performing analysis and design as well as a proven team player to achieve project goals, in addition to good personal & communication skills.

Key responsibilities include:

  • Provide technical directions on tactical and strategical basis for the team. 
  • Support other team members and ensure healthy team atmosphere following SEEK culture. 
  • Ensure that the team is following technical best practices whenever possible, documenting and managing technical debt whenever it’s not the case. 
  • Help evolve delivery processes to continuously improve the Seek Asia apps. 
  • Contributing to SEEK’s overall apps technology strategy and aligning systems with that strategy. 
  • Ensuring systems are fit for purpose, well architected and follow current SEEK development practices. 
  • Maintaining platform health ensuring that our systems are highly scalable, available, performant, maintainable, secure and cost effective. 
  • Driving customer focus to ensure that we are delivering great outcomes for our customers. 
  • Help facilitate the healthy tension between the desire for immediate delivery and the long-term viability of the code bases. 
  • Share & organise operational support duties. 

So, what we are looking for?

We are looking for an engineering leader who have been experienced in software engineering with good balance between people & technical skills to help us building some of our green field projects, someone with a start-up background and growth mindset would fit perfectly in our team. 

This role will include technical, leadership & managerial responsibilities. 

Experience

  • Involve in collaboration with stakeholders to understand business challenges and customer needs, removing bottlenecks and identifying new opportunities for growth.
  • Knowledge of industry best practices, regulations and compliance (GDPR, PDPI), and quality assurance techniques.
  • Experience working with & managing geo-distributed teams.

Personal Skills

  • Applies relevant technologies knowledge to the development and improvement of software applications, being able to drive better technical decision at the team level.
  • Positive attitude and a clear sense of initiative.
  • Has a growth mindset - flexible, open, and actively seeking opportunities to improve.
  • Continuously learn and understand the business requirements, customer, and end-user feedback to further improve the products.
  • Actively investing time in technical growth.
  • Manage own time well, being able to support fellow engineers and be critical on inefficiencies. 
  • Highly self-motivated team player with good analytical and conceptual thinking, results-driven and customer focus.
  • Ability to share new knowledge and new tools to cultivate constructive conversations and improve team capabilities.
  • Support fellow team members in their career progression aspiration.
  • Open minded collaborator and clear communicator who can manage stakeholders' expectations well.

Technical Skills

  • Test-driven development and agile software delivery methods.
  • Hands-on experience in estimating, planning, designing, implementing, testing and operating highly scalable, available, performant, maintainable, secure and cost effective, being able to implement this independently and able to support other team members with supervision and direction to achieve our team goals.
  • Knowledge in Native mobile development languages (Swift & Kotlin), JavaScript, Typescript, React and ideally React Native.
  • Creates software in at least two modern software development languages.
  • Creates and maintains continuous delivery pipelines using current agile practices, patterns & tooling.
  • Creates software using secure coding practices and mitigates common vulnerabilities.
  • Working knowledge of modern stacks e.g. Node.js, Express, GraphQL, Jest, React, Docker, Apollo.
  • Uses current technical practices such as writing clean, testable code and pair programming.
  • Knowledge of building solutions deployed on AWS with immutable infrastructure via infrastructure as code.

Additional information

For this reason, SEEK has a policy requiring all new employees to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19, unless a formal medical exemption applies. On this basis, as part of the application process you will be asked to confirm that you have read and understood this policy, and would like to continue with the hiring process. Further details about this policy will be shared during the hiring process, as required.

Technical Skills
